body:
New year's a coming.
Anyone got any new years resolutions in mind?

Personally, I'm aiming at decreasing the amount of time I spend procrastonating but I don't know how long that'll last.
xD

What about you guys?

replies.body:
I've fixed my procrastination issue mostly, my goal is to work harder in school, because I haven't really been trying, and it's evident in my grades.

Edit: I'd also like to become a better friend, and put my friends before myself and Avicus. I tend to get really angry and emotional easily, and I take it out on others, which is another thing I'd like to fix.
replies.body_tagged:
I've fixed my procrastination issue mostly, my goal is to work harder in school, because I haven't really been trying, and it's evident in my grades.

Edit: I'd also like to become a better friend, and put my friends before myself and Avicus. I tend to get really angry and emotional easily, and I take it out on others, which is another thing I'd like to fix.

replies.body:
To improve as a person, as a student, as a son, and as a friend...
It's a fresh new start, and I won't waste any more time.
There's been a lot of things that held me back from doing what I truly wanted to do.
I was full of fear, and sorrow, I was scared of reality and I tried to run away from it.
But, we're not alone, we always have people around us, even if it doesn't seem like it, you just haven't realized how important you are to some people...
I'll be waiting for you, 2015.

I'll be waiting for you, 2015.

replies.body: Be active. Both on Avicus and OCN, as well as IRL. I spend basically no time being active IRL, which is reeeally bad, and I've gone slightly inactive on Avicus because of OCN. I want to make a proper balance between the 3, while still doing well in school. Even if this means making some sacrifices to my social life, which is definitely a possibility.
